entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (restuss_battle_cryer.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_4: The battle of Restuss on the moon of Rori is reaching a boiling point. I've heard that the Empire and Rebels alike are mobilizing enormous armies to their bases around the city. Any day now we can expect an escalation to all out war in Restuss.
